name: Chinese Food Cooking -Sim Game
description: This brand new Chinese Food Cooking which is clearly a cooking game and you actually get to learn a very interesting Chinese food recipe and we are sure you are going to love it. But this Chinese Food Cooking is in fact a game with two levels because first of all you have to clean so this is a cleaning game as well and you have to clean the kitchen. That won't be the easiest thing because you don't really have instructions but we are sure you can clean the place and make it look just like it should. Then you get to cook and here when it comes to the cooking part, of course that you will have the recipe. Good luck!
